meta.homeDesc: Find trusted service providers in Norway: repairs, cleaning, construction, car service and more.
meta.servicesDesc: Browse service providers in Norway by city and category.
meta.contactDesc: Questions about Linkseta? Send us a message.
meta.becomeDesc: Join Linkseta and publish your services in Norway.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.introText: By using Linkseta you agree to these terms.
terms.account1: You are responsible for keeping your account secure.
terms.account2: Do not use false or misleading information.
terms.account3: We may suspend accounts in case of abuse.
terms.content1: Illegal or misleading content is not allowed.
terms.content2: You are responsible for information in your listings.
terms.content3: Linkseta may remove listings that violate the rules.
terms.liabilityText: Linkseta is not responsible for provider actions or transactions between users.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.what3: Technical data for security (e.g., IP, user-agent).
privacy.whyText: We use data to run accounts, display listings and keep the platform secure.
privacy.cookiesText: We use essential cookies for login and sessions. Analytics may be enabled later.
privacy.rights3: Opt out of marketing messages (if used).
